ActJUDGES ACT (ANNUITIES TO SURVIVORS)
PrecisGranting of a lifelong annuity to THÉRÈSE RIOPEL, widow of the Honourable Jean-Guy Riopel, a retired Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, commencing on June 20, 2008.
